en-CA.summary: Climb fall is fun game combining the traditional 'snakes and ladders' board game and quiz, with an option to roll two die based on your quiz score.
en-CA.name: Climb fall
en-CA.description: The snakes and ladders game was invented in 13th century, where the players climb when they reach the ladder, and fall when they reach the snake. This is a two player game and will not be your usual snake and ladder game.After each player rolls a die, you will be asked a quiz with four options. If you tell the correct answer, you will get an option to roll another die. By rolling this die, you get a chance either to increase your position, or reduce your opponents position, whichever you choose. Sounds fun?

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
No persmissions required.
Game:
open climb fall - will start the game and introduce with the game instructions.
option one, option two, option three, option four - for choosing the quiz answers
increase, or reduce - for increasing current player's score or for reducing the opponents score.
Once the player reaches or crosses the max position 100, game will end
